title: can't connect to my email on my firefox browser?
content:
I have never had this problem before Getting following message: an error occurred during a connection to idm.ffinity.com Error code: sec_error_revoked_certificate. says to contact "website owners" to inform them of this problem

what can I do to get this corrected. Firefox is my default browser and definitely the one I want to use. I would hate to leave Firefox over this issue, but I have to be able to receive emails quickly. I know that my firefox is up to date. thanks for any help!
creator: playthatfiddle

title: how can I save all firefox settings, bookmarkds, history and extentions to reset my computer?
content: how can I save all firefox settings, bookmarkds, history and extentions to reset my computer?
creator: Davenmic

title: Cannot remove auto-complete URLs from history
content:
When you start typing a URL and Firefox starts offering suggestions based on URLs you've visited before, normally you can use the down arrow to highlight one, then hold SHIFT and pres DEL, and it will remove that listing.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/address-bar-autocomplete-firefox#w_removing-autocomplete-results

For some reason, that isn't working for me anymore. Even when I click the little "..." and select Remove From History...nothing happens.

Currently running Firefox 116.0.2 (64-bit) on Windows 10 64-bit. Not sure what's going wrong here; this function worked in the past but now it doesn't for some reason.
creator: gotmilk0112
